title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10 ft Rustic Sheer Gauze Tablecloth – Boho Wedding Decor, Romantic Table Runner for Bridal Shower, Birthday Party, Restaurants, Hotels – 35" x 118" (Terracotta)

Overview:
Create an effortlessly romantic, boho-inspired tablescape with this 12-pack of terracotta cheesecloth table runners. Each gauzy, rustic-chic runner measures 35 inches wide by 118 inches long (10 ft), offering generous coverage and elegant drape for weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, and everyday entertaining.

Key Features:
- Premium Material: Made from high-quality polyester that feels soft and skin-friendly while offering excellent durability. Lightweight yet sturdy, it resists wear and tear and holds its shape for repeated use.
- Generous Size: Each runner is 35" W x 118" L (10 ft) for a graceful, airy look that fits most tables, from banquet and farmhouse to round and rectangular styles.
- Boho-Romantic Style: Rustic sheer gauze texture delivers a relaxed, elegant aesthetic—perfect for layering with centerpieces, greenery, candles, and florals.
- Versatile Use: Ideal for wedding receptions, bridal showers, holiday gatherings, birthday parties, restaurants, and hotels. Also great as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, and creative gift wrapping.
- Easy to Style & Store: Soft, lightweight fabric drapes beautifully and is easy to fold, store, and carry for event planners and hosts.

What’s Included:
- 12 pieces of cheesecloth table runners
- Each runner measures 35 inches x 118 inches (10 ft)
- Color: Terracotta

Care Instructions:
- Reusable and easy to clean
- Hand wash or machine wash on gentle cycle
- Use cold water and mild detergent
- Do not iron
- Avoid hot water

Customer Support:
Have questions or need assistance? Feel free to contact us—we’re here to help ensure your event looks stunning.
